other_tests.findings: Dense monomorphic infiltrate of small mature lymphocytes with scant cytoplasm; evidence of necrosis; no evidence of large-cell transformation; monoclonal B cells characteristic of CLL.

other_tests.procedure_name: Excisional Biopsy of Right Inguinal Lymph Node
other_tests.findings: Evidence of diffuse involvement by CLL, increased number of paraimmunoblasts, prominent plasmacytic cells, areas of necrosis characteristic of HSV.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Right pelvic sidewall lymph node had decreased in size after treatment.
